abstract: Bronx woman Haya Konte is indicted on two counts of criminally negligent homicide and two counts of endangering welfare of a child in connection with apartment fire that killed her two daughters.

headline.print_headline: Woman Charged in Bronx Apartment Fire That Killed Her 2 Daughters
headline.main: Woman Charged in Bronx Apartment Fire That Killed Her 2 Daughters

snippet: Haya Konte faces charges of criminally negligent homicide and child endangerment in the April blaze her family’s apartment, prosecutors said....
lead_paragraph: Haya Konte faces charges of criminally negligent homicide and child endangerment in the April blaze her family’s apartment, prosecutors said.
